name: Second Claw Shop
description:
You used to be useless trash in the 7th circle of Hell, but you finally got a job in a pawn shop downtown, run by some nice archdemon dude.

You better keep it as long as you can, 'cuz all those waifu posters aren't gonna buy themselves, scrub! Keep clients happy by collecting their old stuff and selling whatever they need from the back store. Try to keep up, because lots of useless trash is coming in, and you don't want to be overrun. Mess up too often and you are out.

Boy, working in retail sure is hellish!

Game done by a team in Ludum Dare 42, see more here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/second-claw-shop
